title: Trump says Ukraine deal ‘closer than ever’ after talks in Berlin
description: Germany says US to provide security guarantees as Kyiv and Washington admit differences on territorial issues
content: Germany says US to provide security guarantees as Kyiv and Washington admit differences on territorial issues
